text: Jiří Patera (10 October 1936 – 3 January 2022) was a Czech-born Canadian mathematician and academic. He taught at the Université de Montréal. He was known for his work in group theory, Lie groups, and cryptography. Patera died in Montreal on 3 January 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Czechoslovak academics Category:Canadian mathematicians Category:Academics of Université de Montréal Category:Czech writers Category:Writers from Montreal
title: Jiří Patera
